text:
I am submitting this bug in order to submit the changes discussed for the NDC
class in the log4j-dev list.

Specifically, the NDC class has been re-written to use the ThreadLocal
technology in J2SE 1.2 and beyond.  As such, some issues with the prior
implementation concerning performance and synchronization have been eliminated.

Backwards compatibility has been maintained.  Some methods no longer serve a
purpose (e.g. remove()) but remain for backwards compatibility.  Also, a child
thread needs to explicitly inherit a parent thread's context, as was the case
before the change.

Also included is a simple test case for the NDC class.

I will post CVS patches as attachments ASAP.
